mapper.insert: insert into dolbom_tbl values (dolbom_tbl_seq.nextval, #{d_id}, #{d_name}, #{d_category}, #{d_year}, #{d_month}, #{d_day}, #{d_hour}, #{d_check}, #{d_location}, #{d_gender}, #{d_personality}, #{d_pay}, #{d_cctv}, #{d_can_do}, #{d_sitterage}, #{d_need}, #{d_title}, #{d_term}, null, null, null)

insert into momsitter_tbl values (#{ms_id}, #{ms_file}, #{ms_confirm}, #{ms_confirm_answer}, #{ms_cctv}, #{ms_term}, #{ms_day}, #{ms_hour}, #{ms_location1}, #{ms_location2}, #{ms_location3}, #{ms_extra}, #{ms_exp}, #{ms_pay}, #{ms_point}, #{ms_count}, #{ms_can_do}, #{ms_can_type}, 0, null, null, null)
